body.name: Commercial Mop with 60" Mop Handle, Heavy Duty Industrial Cotton Mops for Floor Cleaning, Looped-End String Wet Mop for Home, Kitchen, Garage, Office, Workshop, Warehouse Concrete/Tile Floor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 5 mins
features: 【Industrial Grade】Heavy Duty Commercial Industrial Grade Wet Mops--- The string wet mop with 1 x 58" long stainless steel handle, 1 x mop head connector and 1 x large size mopheads is a perfect choice for commercial, industrial or residential floor cleaning

【Premium Long Handle】GRAREND heavy duty mops for floor cleaning handle is made of thickened stainless steel, with high-quality coating, rust-proof, wear-resistant, non-slip, sturdy and durable. The 60 inch long mop allows you to stand upright for cleaning, reducing the strain on your waist

【Great Mop Head】Our mop head made of 75% Cotton+25% Synthetic Rayon Blend offer Higher Absorbency and Strength, safety durability. Looped end mop reduces fraying and virtually eliminates lint and untwisting; Easy to Wash
【Used for Various Environments】 The looped-end cotton finish mop is ideal for any cleaning task, designed for floor applications in commercial, industrial, and residential use

【Quality Service】Our GRAREND brand is registered and it has large factories to support, so if you encounter any problem while using the product, please feel free to contact our support team. We would sincerely serve you

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GRAREND Heavy Duty Commercial Mop 60inch Long Handle Mop Heavy DUTY Commercial Universal Mops are designed with high quality, custom 4-ply blend yarn for superior strength and absorbency to clean up spills quickly. The looped-end also improves cleaning performance while providing greater floor coverage for fast and efficient use.

This all-purpose mop is suitable for any cleaning job including: industrial cleaning, janitorial, and household environments Premium Mop with Stainless Steel Handle Premium Stainless Steel Handle The mop handle is 60 inches long, which providing you with enough length to use it ，without bending over and relieving your waist. Made of high-quality stainless steel, and thicken design , Provide you with enough support. Don't have to worry about the commercial mop handle being bent due to pressure . Safe Heavy Duty Mop Head This mop is safe to use on all hard surfaces for scratch free, wet and dry mopping. Well suited for commercial, industrial, and residential use. This mop has been designed for any cleaning task including: industrial cleaning, janitorial, and household environments. Super Absorbent Cotton Mop Head Microfiber cotton material dust mop head , it can easily remove the dirt and absorb the water stains on the floor . Looped-end design string mop head to prevent the loops from getting tangle and reduce fraying. And it also helps the loops flat on the floor for maximum surface area contact . Reduce cleaning time . Machine Washable Absorbent mop heads are launderable for extended long-term usage. Looped-end yarn design in the mop enhances productivity and is durable for machine washing. Long-lasting fibres allows mop head to be laundered many times giving it a longer service life. This mop is launderable up to times for long-lasting durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Great mop can't wait to get a mop bucket to go with it. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s light,mops the floor is clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These look and feel like quality mop heads. Great for commercial business or home use.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like these thick mop heads. They fit my mop. Better price than name brand and IMO a bargain at 4 for this price. Feels like they will last are easy to clean and absorbent. I don't really like the band that holds the ends together. I'd rather that each mop string is loose and not "tied" together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absorbent, heavy duty mop heads.
reviews.reviewText: They're big, heavy duty mop heads.They do the job they're made for nicely and are easy to drop in the washer to clean after.At roughly $6.25 each they're a good value for the asking price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected.
reviews.reviewText: The pole had threads but the head hole did not. The pole just swiveled and the mop was ineffective.If it was not too much trouble I would send back for a refund. Disappointed in the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work Great and Lightweight
reviews.reviewText: Love these, they work great. By far the best I've used so far. What I really like, they're not heavy when they're wet. I have several other brands made from different materials, and some of them are just so heavy for me to lift it up out of the bucket. They clean up/rinse good. And most importantly, they mop up good. I use these with a commercial Rubbermaid handle, think it's the Invader one. Definitely recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Industrial Use / Great Price
reviews.reviewText: These mop heads have been great in that they have stood up to heavy usage. We use them to mop clean a painted automotive shop floor. They have to pick up a lot of dirt and oil, and they have not deteriorated nor frayed any loose strings. They are thick but still allow for squeezing all the water out when compressed in bucket vice. I couldn't ask for better especially at this good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good mophead with mismatched handle
reviews.reviewText: This is a great looking mophead that I wanted to use and enjoy but could not because the handle does not fit the mophead. There are no threads inside the part that you insert the mophead into, so it doesn't attach. On its own the mophead is great if you have a fitting handle for it.I received refund so not a problem.
